data.name: Rainswept - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for Rainswept, consisting of 28 tracks - 1 hour 36 minutes of original music from the game! The soundtrack has been composed by micamic (Michal Michalski) and includes tracks by Kitty and Sam Ray.

Track listing:

1. Welcome to Pineview
2. Downpour
3. Investigation
4. Rainswept
5. Linger
6. Church on the Rock
7. Exploring Pineview
8. Sunny Cafe
9. Sunny Cafe - Nostalgia
10. Mountain Road
11. Mountain Road - Detour
12. Mountain Road - Scenic Route
13. The Old Woods
14. The Old Woods (Ambient)
15. Malaise
16. Uncovered Details
17. Overcast Sunrise
18. Hopelessness
19. Allan's Pub
20. A Rainy Morning
21. A Rainy Morning (Ambient)
22. Chasing Firelights
23. Defeat
24. Unfolding
25. A Hopeful Morning (Ambient)
26. A Hopeful Morning
27. Just in Case
28. Universe Away


Credits:

Music by micamic
"Universe Away" and "Just in Case" by Kitty and Sam Ray

Format: MP3

How to find the downloaded OST files:

1. Right click Rainswept from the Steam Library
2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
3. The music files and the album cover will be found in a folder named "Rainswept Original Soundtrack"

data.short_description: The Official Soundtrack for Rainswept - Consisting of 28 tracks and 1 hour 36 minutes of original music from the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 221 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 221 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
